caseTitle: M.S. Sui Northern Gas Pipelines Ltd (SNGPL) thr. its G.M., Phase-V Hayatabad Peshawar v. Ms. Noor CNG Filling Station, Peshawar
tagline: (1) Appeal filed on behalf of the petitioner without Board Resolution or Power of attorney which was dismissed. Discussion on Order XXIX Rule 1, Order VI Rule 14, Order VI Rule 15, Order III Rule 4, Order XLI Rule 1 of C.P.C. (2) Under Section 9 of C.P.C., the Civil Courts have the jurisdiction to try all suits of civil nature unless expressly or impliedly barred. (3) The ouster of civil court jurisdiction cannot be straightaway inferred or congregated unless the conditions laid down are fulfilled.
